To warrant that the simulated forests at the end of the simulation run were at pseudo-equilibrium ( i.e. a state in which total biomass varies weakly across years, but where gaps continue to occur randomly in the forest), we considered the last 1,000 years of each simulation run
29 . For each simulation, we collected the realized species richness ( i.e. final richness at the end of the simulation), relative abundance and mean productivity of each species. Mean productivity values were calculated by averaging the yearly productivity (newly accumulated biomass) over the years 1100, 1200, â€¦, 2000 ( i.e., 10 samples at decadal intervals over 100 years) in order to minimize temporal autocorrelation.
